question.query: what projects have had the most mindshare gain over the last 24 hours

steps.text:
[
  {
    "type": "text",
    "text": "![Mindshare (24h) – top gainers](attachment:mindshare_gainers_24h.png)

Biggest **mindshare gainers over the last 24h** (sorted by **mindshare absolute change 24h**). This is *attention delta*, not price performance.

| Project | Chain | MCap | 24h Mindshare | **Δ Mindshare (24h)** | **Δ% (24h)** | 24h Volume | Liquidity |
|---|---:|---:|---:|---:|---:|---:|---:|
| **MetaDAO (META)** | Solana | **$135.2M** | 0.00512 | **+0.00360** | **+236.5%** | $1.82M | $4.61M |
| **Fartcoin (FARTCOIN)** | Solana | **$399.3M** | 0.00354 | **+0.00307** | **+656.2%** | $38.46M | $18.35M |
| **PsyopAnime (PSYOPANIME)** | Solana | **$13.1M** | 0.00339 | **+0.00323** | **+1968.5%** | $52.03M | $0.87M |
| **DoubleZero (2Z)** | Solana | **$1.21B** | 0.00363 | **+0.00208** | **+133.4%** | $1.17M | $1.50M |
| **Collector Crypt (CARDS)** | Solana | **$23.1M** | 0.00243 | **+0.00162** | **+201.2%** | $3.69M | $1.53M |
| **Helium (HNT)** | Solana | **$255.8M** | 0.00248 | **+0.00101** | **+68.5%** | $1.05M | $1.66M |
| **Useless Coin (USELESS)** | Solana | **$111.4M** | 0.00272 | **+0.00070** | **+34.6%** | $6.00M | $6.55M |
| **Ranger Finance (RNGR)** | Solana | **$17.1M** | 0.00349 | **+0.00063** | **+22.1%** | $1.98M | $4.35M |
| **Walrus (WAL)** | Sui | **$753.1M** | 0.00133 | **+0.00053** | **+65.7%** | $3.77M | $0.88M |
| **Official Trump (TRUMP)** | Solana | **$1.11B** | 0.00023 | **+0.00023** | **+79.6%** | $54.12M | $177.85M |
| **Melania Meme (MELANIA)** | Solana | **$175.5M** | 0.00022 | **+0.00022** | n/a | $1.49M | $21.32M |
| **Zerebro (ZEREBRO)** | Solana | **$26.7M** | 0.00039 | **+0.00039** | n/a | $5.60M | $2.20M |
| **U.S Oil (USOR)** | Solana | **$6.6M** | 0.00010 | **+0.00010** | n/a | $2.66M | $0.37M |
| **Mia Ko (MIA)** | Solana | **$4.0M** | 0.00024 | **+0.00024** | n/a | $2.45M | $0.62M |

**What stands out**
- **MetaDAO** and **DoubleZero** look like “catalyst-driven” attention (governance + grants/news flow).  
- **PsyopAnime / Fartcoin / TRUMP / MELANIA** are attention magnets where **mindshare spikes can revert fast**, but they’re also the most reflexive if flows follow mentions.
- **Zerebro** has **huge volume + large negative price move** (-41% 24h) while still gaining attention—reads like forced unwind / controversy-driven mentions rather than organic adoption.",

agentResult.finalAnswer:
![Mindshare (24h) – top gainers](attachment:mindshare_gainers_24h.png)

Biggest **mindshare gainers over the last 24h** (sorted by **mindshare absolute change 24h**). This is *attention delta*, not price performance.

| Project | Chain | MCap | 24h Mindshare | **Δ Mindshare (24h)** | **Δ% (24h)** | 24h Volume | Liquidity |
|---|---:|---:|---:|---:|---:|---:|---:|
| **MetaDAO (META)** | Solana | **$135.2M** | 0.00512 | **+0.00360** | **+236.5%** | $1.82M | $4.61M |
| **Fartcoin (FARTCOIN)** | Solana | **$399.3M** | 0.00354 | **+0.00307** | **+656.2%** | $38.46M | $18.35M |
| **PsyopAnime (PSYOPANIME)** | Solana | **$13.1M** | 0.00339 | **+0.00323** | **+1968.5%** | $52.03M | $0.87M |
| **DoubleZero (2Z)** | Solana | **$1.21B** | 0.00363 | **+0.00208** | **+133.4%** | $1.17M | $1.50M |
| **Collector Crypt (CARDS)** | Solana | **$23.1M** | 0.00243 | **+0.00162** | **+201.2%** | $3.69M | $1.53M |
| **Helium (HNT)** | Solana | **$255.8M** | 0.00248 | **+0.00101** | **+68.5%** | $1.05M | $1.66M |
| **Useless Coin (USELESS)** | Solana | **$111.4M** | 0.00272 | **+0.00070** | **+34.6%** | $6.00M | $6.55M |
| **Ranger Finance (RNGR)** | Solana | **$17.1M** | 0.00349 | **+0.00063** | **+22.1%** | $1.98M | $4.35M |
| **Walrus (WAL)** | Sui | **$753.1M** | 0.00133 | **+0.00053** | **+65.7%** | $3.77M | $0.88M |
| **Official Trump (TRUMP)** | Solana | **$1.11B** | 0.00023 | **+0.00023** | **+79.6%** | $54.12M | $177.85M |
| **Melania Meme (MELANIA)** | Solana | **$175.5M** | 0.00022 | **+0.00022** | n/a | $1.49M | $21.32M |
| **Zerebro (ZEREBRO)** | Solana | **$26.7M** | 0.00039 | **+0.00039** | n/a | $5.60M | $2.20M |
| **U.S Oil (USOR)** | Solana | **$6.6M** | 0.00010 | **+0.00010** | n/a | $2.66M | $0.37M |
| **Mia Ko (MIA)** | Solana | **$4.0M** | 0.00024 | **+0.00024** | n/a | $2.45M | $0.62M |

**What stands out**
- **MetaDAO** and **DoubleZero** look like “catalyst-driven” attention (governance + grants/news flow).  
- **PsyopAnime / Fartcoin / TRUMP / MELANIA** are attention magnets where **mindshare spikes can revert fast**, but they’re also the most reflexive if flows follow mentions.
- **Zerebro** has **huge volume + large negative price move** (-41% 24h) while still gaining attention—reads like forced unwind / controversy-driven mentions rather than organic adoption.

parameters.instructions: Across all chains, find projects with the largest mindshare gain over the last 24 hours. Prioritize liquid, tradeable tokens (min liquidity $250k, min 24h volume $1m). Exclude stablecoins and wrapped majors. Return top 15.
